subDescription: Buy Gems wit' gold, get monthly mystery loot, retain progress history, double daily drop-caps, support th' devs. Click fer more info.
buyGemsGoldText: Alexander th' Merchant will sell ye Sapphires at a cost o' 20 Gold per Gem. His monthly shipments are initially capped at 25 Sapphires per month, but fer every 3 consecutive months that ye be subscribed, this cap increases by 5 Sapphires, up t' a maximum o' 50 Sapphires per month!
mustSubscribeToPurchaseGems: Must subscribe t' purchase sapphires with Doubloons
reachedGoldToGemCap: Ye've reached th' Gold=>Sapphires conversion cap <%= convCap %> fer this month. We 'ave this t' prevent abuse / farmin'. Th' cap resets within th' first three days o' each month.
reachedGoldToGemCapQuantity: Yer requested amount <%= quantity %> exceeds th' Gold=>Sapphire conversion cap <%= convCap %> fer this month. We 'ave this t' prevent abuse / farmin'. Th' cap resets within th' first three days o' each month.
retainHistoryText: Makes completed To-Dos an' task history available fer longer.
mysteryItemText: Each month ye 'll receive a unique cosmetic item for yer avatar! Plus, for every three months o' consecutive subscription, the Mysterious Time Travelers 'll grant you access t' historic (an' futuristic!) cosmetic items.
supportDevsText: Yer subscription helps keep Habitica thrivin' an' helps fund th' development o' new features. Thank ye f'r yer generosity!
exclusiveJackalopePetText: Get th' Royal Purple Jackalope pet, available only t' subscribers!
giftSubscription: Want t' gift a subscription t' someone?
giftSubscriptionText1: Open their profile! Ye can do this by clicking on their avatar in yer crew header or by clicking on their name in chat.
giftSubscriptionText2: Click on th' gift icon in th' top right o' their profile.
giftSubscriptionText3: Select "subscription" n' enter yer payment information.
indivPlan1: Fer individuals, Habitica is free t' play. Even fer small interest groups, free (er cheap)
indivPlan2: can be used t' motivate participants in behavioral modification. Think writin' crews, art duels, an' more.
groupText1: But some group leaders will want more control, privacy, security, an' support. Examples of such groups be clans, health an' wellness groups, bilge rat groups, an' more. These plans provide private instances o' Habitica fer yer group or organization, secure an' independent o'
groupText2: See below fer additional plan perks, an' contact us fer more information!
dedicatedHostText: Dedicated Hosting: ye git yer own database and server hosted by Habitica, or optionally we'll install it in yer organization's network. If not checked, t' plan uses "Shared Hosting": yer organization uses t' same database as Habitica proper while performing independently Habitica. Yer members be shielded from Pub & Ships, but still on thee same server/database.
nowSubscribed: Ye are now subscribed t' Habitica!
cancelSubInfoGoogle: Please go t' th' "Account" > "Subscriptions" section o' th' Google Play Store app t' cancel yer subscription or t' see yer subscription's termination date if ye 'ave already cancelled it. This screen is not able t' show ye whether yer subscription has been cancelled.
cancelSubInfoApple: Please follow Apple's official instructions t' cancel yer subscription or t' see yer subscription's termination date if ye have already cancelled it. This screen is not able t' show ye whether yer subscription has been cancelled.
cancelSubInfoGroupPlan: 'cause ye 'ave a free subscription from a Ship Plan, ye cannot cancel it. 'twill end when ye be no longer in th' Ship. If ye be th' Ship leader 'n want t' cancel th' entire Ship Plan, ye can do that from th' ship's "Payment Details" tab.
organizationSubText: Members of t' organization participate outside of Habitica proper, providing focus for yer participants.
hostingTypeText: Shared hosting means yer organization uses t' same database as Habitica proper even though ye don't interact with Habitica. Dedicated means ye git yer own database and server. Ye can choose to have Habitica bilge rat yer server/db, or we can install it on yer own servers.
customDomainText: We can optionally give ye yer own domain fer th' installation.
maxPlayersText: Th' maximum number o' players in yer private organization.
priSupportText: First t' be provided fer wit' support.
timeSupportText: We will provide support fer trainin', bugs, installation, an' feature requests.
gold2GemText: Members be able to purchase Gems wit' gold, so's none of yer participants be needin' to buy anythin wit' real money.
infiniteGemText: We be providin' the organization leaders with as many Gems as needed, fer things like challenge prizes, guild-creation, etc.
notYetPlan: Plan not yet available, but click t' contact us an' we'll keep ye updated.
sureCancelSub: Arrr ye sure ye want t' cancel yer subscription?
subGemPop: Because ye subscribe to Habitica, ye can purchase a number o' Sapphires each month using Gold.
maxBuyGems: Ye 'ave bought all th' Sapphires ye can this month. More become available within th' first three days o' each month. Thanks fer subscribin'!
subFreeGemsHow: Habitica players can earn Sapphires fer free by winning challenges that award Sapphires as a prize, or as a contributor reward by helping th' development o' Habitica.
seeSubscriptionDetails: Go t' Settings > Subscription t' see yer subscription details!
timeTravelersPopoverNoSub: Ye'll need a Mystic Hourglass t' summon th' mysterious Time Travelers! <%= linkStart %>Subscribers<%= linkEnd %> earn one Mystic Hourglass fer every three months o' consecutive subscribin'. Come back when ye have a Mystic Hourglass, an' th' Time Travelers will fetch ye a rare pet, mount, or Subscriber Item Set from th' past... or maybe even th' future.
timeTravelersPopoverNoSubMobile: Looks like ye’ll need a Mystic Hourglass t' open th' time portal n' summon th' Mysterious Time Travelers.
timeTravelersPopover: Yer Mystic Hourglass has opened our time portal! Choose what ye’d like us t' fetch from th' past or future.
timeTravelersAlreadyOwned: Ahoy! Ye already own everything the Time Travelers currently offer. Many thanks for supportin' th' site!
mysticHourglassPopover: A Mystic Hourglass allows ye to purchase certain limited-time items, such as monthly Mystery Item Sets and awards from world bosses, from th' past!
mysterySetNotFound: Mystery set nah found, or set already owned.
subUpdateDescription: Update th' card t' be charged.
hourglassBuyEquipSetConfirm: Buy this full set o' items fer 1 Mystic Hourglass?
hourglassBuyItemConfirm: Buy this item fer 1 Mystic Hourglass?
petsAlreadyOwned: Ahoy! Ye already own this pet.
mountsAlreadyOwned: Ahoy! Ye already own this mount.
typeNotAllowedHourglass: Item type nah supported fer purchase wit' Mystic Hourglass. Allowed types: <%= allowedTypes %>
petsNotAllowedHourglass: This pet be not available for purchase with th' Mystic Hourglass.
mountsNotAllowedHourglass: This mount be not available for purchase with th' Mystic Hourglass.
hourglassPurchase: Ye purchased an item using a Mystic Hourglass!
hourglassPurchaseSet: Ye purchased an item set using a Mystic Hourglass!
missingSubscription: User does nah 'ave a plan subscription
missingSubscriptionCode: Missin' subscription code. Possible values: basic_earned, basic_3mo, basic_6mo, google_6mo, basic_12mo.
cannotDeleteActiveAccount: Ye have an active subscription, cancel yer plan before deleting yer account.
planNotActive: Th' plan hasn't activated yet (due t' a PayPal bug). It'll begin <%= nextBillingDate %>, after which ye can cancel t' retain yer full benefits
notAllowedHourglass: Pet/Mount nah available fer purchase wit' Mystic Hourglass.
earnGemsMonthly: Earn up t' **<%= cap %> Sapphires** per month
subscribeSupportsDevs: Subscribin' supports th' developers n' helps keep Habitica runnin'
buyGemsSupportsDevs: Purchasin' Sapphires supports th' developers n' helps keep Habitica runnin'
gemBenefitLeadin: Sapphires allow ye t' buy fun extras fer yer account, includin':
gemBenefit1: Unique n' fashionable costumes fer yer avatar.
gemBenefit2: Backgrounds t' immerse yer avatar in th' world o' Habitica!
gemBenefit3: Excitin' Adventure chains that drop pet eggs.
gemBenefit4: Reset yer avatar's Stat Points n' change its Class.
subscriptionBenefitLeadin: Support Habitica by becomin' a subscriber n' ye'll receive these useful benefits!
subscriptionBenefit1: Alexander the Merchant will sell ye Sapphires, fer 20 Gold each!
subscriptionBenefit2: Completed T'-Dos n' task history are available fer longer.
subscriptionBenefit3: Discover more items in Habitica wit' a doubled daily drop cap.
subscriptionBenefit4: Unique cosmetic items fer yer avatar each month.
subscriptionBenefit5: Receive th' exclusive Royal Purple Jackalope pet!
subscriptionBenefit6: Earn Mystic Hourglasses fer use in th' Time Travelers' Shop!
subscriptionAlreadySubscribed1: T' see yer subscription details n' cancel, renew, or change yer subscription, please go t' User icon > Settings > Subscription.
gemsPurchaseNote: Subscribers can buy sapphires fer gold in th' Market! Fer easy access, ye can also pin th' sapphire to yer Rewards column.
notEnoughGemsToBuy: Ye are unable t' buy that amount o' sapphires
